mapper.select: select * from booknotes where isbn = #{isbn} and pub_priv=0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booknotes (MEMBER_NUM, ISBN, NOTE_CONTENTS, NOTE_TITLE, PUB_PRIV, JOAYO, b_title, b_imag, b_author, b_publisher, b_pubdate, b_description) VALUES( #{member_num}, #{isbn}, #{note_contents}, #{note_title}, #{pub_priv}, #{joayo}, #{b_title}, #{b_imag}, #{b_author}, #{b_publisher}, #{b_pubdate}, #{b_description})
mapper.update: update booknotes set note_title = #{note_title}, note_contents = #{note_contents}, pub_priv = #{pub_priv} where note_id = #{note_id}
